item.title: 苹果再失人工智能研究人员及Siri高管，近期离职潮持续
item.description: 苹果公司近几周又失去了至少四名人工智能研究人员，此前该公司已失去一名Siri高管。这些员工已转投Meta Platforms和谷歌DeepMind等公司。【原文：Apple Inc. has lost at least four more of its artificial intelligence researchers in recent weeks in addition to a top Siri executive, with the staff headed to employers such as Meta Platforms Inc. and Google DeepMind.】

item.title: 软件股如何预示铜价上涨趋势
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了Odd Lots世界每日精选内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是来自我们专家嘉宾及信息源网络的深度贡献。无论内容形式如何，我们承诺始终为您带来精彩内容。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 美联储官员穆萨莱姆称当前降息"不可取"
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托·穆萨莱姆表示，官员们应暂缓进一步降息，以避免助长通胀压力。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said officials should hold off from lowering interest rates further at this time to prevent stoking inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚、雪佛龙创2022年以来最佳月度表现，原油价格飙升
item.description: 美国石油巨头埃克森美孚公司和雪佛龙公司的股价正朝着创下三年多来最大月度涨幅的方向迈进，这得益于能源价格上涨、地缘政治紧张局势以及基本面改善。【原文：Shares of US oil giants Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp. are on track for their largest monthly gains in more than three years, boosted by rising energy prices, geopolitical tensions and improving fundamentals.】

item.title: 卡尼、麦克勒姆祝贺沃什获提名担任美联储理事
item.description: 加拿大总理马克·卡尼和加拿大央行行长蒂夫·麦克勒姆祝贺凯文·沃什获提名领导美联储。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney and Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem congratulated Kevin Warsh on his nomination to lead the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚将基准利率上调至10.25%，令所有分析师大感意外
item.description: 哥伦比亚意外上调借贷成本幅度超出预期，令所有分析师大感意外，因创纪录的最低工资涨幅加剧了通胀压力。【原文：Colombia surprised all analysts by raising borrowing costs more than expected as a record minimum wage increase stokes inflation pressure.】

item.title: 巴西监管机构称，大宗交易使巴西银行出现10亿美元资金缺口
item.description: 巴西一家国有银行正面临日益严格的审查，监管机构估计与倒闭的Banco Master SA银行相关的交易在其财务中造成了近10亿美元的缺口。【原文：A Brazilian state-owned bank is coming under increased scrutiny as regulators estimate transactions tied to failed Banco Master SA left a nearly $1 billion gap in its finances.】

item.title: 《高盾》制作人谈游戏惊心动魄的发布历程
item.description: 自上月宣布新作以来，前Respawn开发者们已卷入诸多纷争。【原文：The former Respawn developers have dealt with a lot of drama since announcing their new game last month】

item.title: 泽西迈克餐厅正出售可通过IPO所得偿还的债务
item.description: 三明治连锁品牌泽西迈克三明治公司正发行约7.6亿美元债券，并告知投资者其保留权利，可利用未来首次公开募股的收益提前偿还约半数本金——这在债券条款中实属罕见。【原文：Sandwich chain Jersey Mike’s Subs is selling about $760 million of bonds and telling investors it reserves the right to repay about half of the principal early with proceeds from a future initial public offering, an unusual feature for the debt.】

item.title: 美联储提名沃什谈降息、资产负债表与"政策转向"
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普总统提名的美联储主席人选凯文·沃什呼吁降低利率，并对美联储进行全面改革，包括缩减资产负债表规模以及重新审视经济模型。【原文：Kevin Warsh, President Donald Trump’s pick to lead the Federal Reserve, has called for lower interest rates and sweeping changes at the central bank that would include reducing the size of its balance sheet and rethinking economic models.】

item.title: 秘鲁财政部长称，该国赤字目标恐扼杀经济增长
item.description: 秘鲁财政部长表示，该国2025年首次实现财政目标，这是三年来首次达成。但如今更严格的目标正拖累经济增长——若放宽赤字上限，经济本可实现更快增长。【原文：Peru hit its fiscal target in 2025 for the first time in three years. But now a stricter goal is weighing on an economy that could grow faster with a less stringent cap on deficits, according to its finance minister.】

item.title: 工业股高歌猛进却面临特朗普贸易政策的逆风
item.description: 本周美国部分大型制造商和运输企业的财报显示，特朗普总统的贸易和能源政策正挤压该行业的利润空间。【原文：Earnings reports from some of the largest US manufacturers and transportation companies this week drove home how President Donald Trump’s policies on trade and energy are putting a squeeze on the sector’s profits.】

item.title: 智利财政赤字连续第三年超出目标
item.description: 2025年，智利财政赤字连续第三年超出政府目标。当选总统何塞·安东尼奥·卡斯特将于3月就职，他承诺将大幅削减数十亿支出。【原文：Chile’s fiscal deficit exceeded the government’s target for the third year in a row in 2025, as President-elect Jose Antonio Kast prepares to take office in March with pledges to slash billions from spending.】

item.title: 中国采用全球债券回购标准以推动人民币发展
item.description: 中国允许境外投资者参与跨境市场的境内回购交易，采用全球统一的合约标准，此举是该国开放固定收益市场、推动人民币资产发展的举措之一。【原文：China allowed foreign investors to participate in onshore repo transactions in the cross-border market, using a global set of standards for the contracts, as part of the country’s efforts to open up its fixed income market and to promote yuan-denominated assets.】

item.title: AC米兰老板以7亿欧元融资重组埃利奥特贷款
item.description: AC米兰的拥有者红鸟资本公司达成一项新债务协议，将用于再融资由埃利奥特管理公司提供的供应商贷款。【原文：RedBird Capital Partners, the owner of AC Milan, struck a deal for a new debt that will refinance a vendor loan provided by Elliott Management Corp.】

item.title: 关税在2025年给加拿大铁路业造成4亿美元损失
item.description: 美国对商品征收关税及其引发的不确定性，导致加拿大两大铁路运营商去年损失逾5.5亿加元（4.06亿美元）的收入。【原文：US tariffs on commodities and the resulting uncertainty led to more than C$550 million ($406 million) in forgone revenues last year at Canada’s two largest railroad operators.】

item.title: 比特币暴跌致温克莱沃斯兄弟超级政治行动委员会捐款缩水数百万
item.description: 由加密货币亿万富翁兄弟卡梅伦·温克莱沃斯和泰勒·温克莱沃斯创立的政治筹款组织在2025年最后五个月筹集了超过2200万美元，但其比特币投入可能无法获得同等回报。【原文：The political fundraising group launched by crypto-billionaire brothers Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss raised more than $22 million in the last five months of 2025, but might not get as much bang for its Bitcoin.】

item.title: 亚马逊在西雅图裁员1400人，当地科技岗位持续萎缩
item.description: 亚马逊公司本周宣布裁员1.6万人，其中西雅图地区约1400人，邻近的贝尔维尤市约700人，相关文件已提交至州及地方当局。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s 16,000 job cuts announced this week include about 1,400 in Seattle and approximately 700 in the neighboring suburb of Bellevue, according to documents filed with state and local authorities.】

item.title: 美联储的米兰认为沃什是富有说服力且备受尊敬的新任主席
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬·米兰表示，他预计特朗普总统提名的美联储主席人选凯文·沃什将在领导美联储货币政策委员会方面表现出色。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said he expects Kevin Warsh, President Donald Trump’s pick to lead the central bank, will prove effective in his leadership of the Fed’s monetary policy committee.】

item.title: 在美国总统特朗普的支持下，美国即将进口一年来最多的委内瑞拉石油
item.description: 在特朗普政府采取措施控制委内瑞拉能源供应后，美国即将创下一年来最大规模的委内瑞拉原油进口纪录。【原文：The US is set to import the most Venezuelan oil in a year after President Donald Trump’s administration moved to control the country’s energy supply.】

item.title: 牛肉价格与新计算方法令阿根廷通胀前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 阿根廷央行在月度货币政策报告中指出，在总统哈维尔·米莱将通胀率从三位数水平大幅压低后，该国未来数月进一步抑制通胀的努力将面临风险。【原文：Argentina’s push to further curb inflation faces risks in coming months after President Javier Milei hammered it down from triple-digit territory, the central bank said in its monthly monetary policy report.】

item.title: 法国健康初创企业Alan正以50亿欧元估值进行融资谈判
item.description: 知情人士透露，法国健康保险初创企业Alan正寻求以50亿欧元（约合59亿美元）的估值进行融资，以扩大其客户群。【原文：Alan is in talks to raise funds at a €5 billion ($5.9 billion) valuation as the French health-insurance startup works to expand its customer base, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 庞巴迪集会因特朗普威胁加拿大喷气机面临新障碍
item.description: 私人飞机制造商庞巴迪公司股价的强劲涨势周五遭遇阻碍，因美国总统特朗普威胁对加拿大飞机征收50%关税，并取消所有在加拿大制造的新飞机的认证。【原文：Private jet-maker Bombardier Inc.’s bullish run hit a roadblock Friday as President Donald Trump threatened to slap a 50% tariff on aircraft from Canada and decertify all new planes made there.】

item.title: 摩根大通开始出售200亿美元EA收购债务的一部分
item.description: 摩根大通公司等多家银行已开始减持备受瞩目的200亿美元债务融资，该融资用于支持对艺电公司的收购——这是有史以来规模最大的杠杆收购案。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is among banks that have begun selling down a highly anticipated $20 billion debt financing backing the acquisition of Electronic Arts Inc., the biggest leveraged buyout on record.】

item.title: 阿波罗为零售客户带来18%回报，其私募股权投资风险更高
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司去年为个人投资者创造了18.3%的回报率，其策略主要押注于私募股权公司希望长期持有或无法出售的单一企业——部分投资者认为这种策略风险相对较高。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. reaped returns of 18.3% last year for individual investors by largely betting on single companies that private equity firms want to hold longer or can’t sell — a strategy viewed by some investors as being relatively risky.】

item.title: 蒂利斯在联邦争端中坚持禁止投票立场，但赞扬沃什
item.description: 共和党参议员汤姆·蒂利斯重申，在针对美联储翻修工程的刑事调查终止前，他将阻挠凯文·沃什出任美联储主席一事，尽管他认为该提名本身是合适的。【原文：Republican Senator Thom Tillis reiterated his intention to block Kevin Warsh from becoming chairman of the Federal Reserve until a criminal investigation into renovations at the Fed is stopped, despite his belief that the nomination is a good one.】

item.title: 新指控笼罩帝亚吉欧与朝日的东非交易
item.description: 一名肯尼亚承包商对帝亚吉欧公司提起新诉讼，要求法院在另一项诉讼解决前，禁止该公司向朝日集团控股公司出售其在东非的资产。【原文：A Kenyan contractor filed a fresh case against Diageo Plc, asking a court to block its proposed sale of East African assets to Asahi Group Holdings Plc until a separate matter is resolved.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行计划推出由高盛管理的美国股票基金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，法国兴业银行旗下资产管理公司正与高盛集团商讨设立一只专注于美国股票的投资基金。【原文：Societe Generale SA’s asset management unit is in discussions with Goldman Sachs about setting up an investment fund focused on US equities, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 在微软股价暴跌期间抄底的基金跑赢99%同类基金
item.description: 过去三年中，有99%的同类基金都跑不赢它——这家法国基金周四趁微软股价暴跌3570亿美元之际大举买入，预测其在人工智能领域的重金投入终将获得回报。【原文：A French fund that has beaten 99% of its peers over the past three years bought into Microsoft Corp.’s $357 billion rout on Thursday, predicting its heavy investments in artificial intelligence will eventually pay off.】

item.title: 南非股市创四月以来最大跌幅，金属股重挫
item.description: 南非股市4月创下最大跌幅，矿业股在贵金属领域惊人的抛售潮中遭受重创。【原文：South African stocks plunged the most in April as mining shares were swept up in the stunning selloff across precious metals.】
